name: Bubble Fish (Samalander, Tynamo2222)
description:
A simple fishing game made for Mini Jam 84: Bubbles.

[Available for Windows, Mac, Linux, Web. Web is Compatible with Mobile]

Use your BubbleGun™ to shoot bubbles with your oxygen and capture fish. Swim deeper to find rarer fish, but it takes up more oxygen.

  • Hold down & Release X to shoot bubbles
  • Press Z to view fish
  • Use boat to visit shop and sell fish
  • Arrow keys to move
  • (Esc. to view a similar tutorial anytime)

It is a known bug that the player may spawn above the water. We will fix it within the next 12-24 hours.

This game was created using only Pico8 (Only supports 16 colors, 65k characters, 32 K max size.)

All sound and graphics were made during the jam by us.

This is also the first game jam we have participated in, please reach out to us if there's anything that we need to know.

Team Members: Samalander, Tynamo2222                                                               

Game Engine: Pico8
